original_title: Sri Lanka shares edge down in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s shares fall in mid day trade on Tuesday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was down 0.37 percent or 32.64 points to 8,733.96, while the most liquid index S&P SL20 was 0.59 percent or 14.71 points to 2,475.17.
Top losers during mid day trade were Aitken Spence, Sampath Bank and Expolanka. (Colombo/June06/2023)
